metadata.title: RA Family: Failed to start debug connection for the application which uses MMF

sections.content:
Question:
Failed to start debug connection for the application which uses MMF
Answer:
Before downloading a program, make sure no breakpoints are set in the memory mirror space. Normally when starting a debug connection, the debugger performs MCU reset. Immediately after MCU reset, MMF is disabled (MMEN.EN = 0). Therefore, do not set breakpoints in the memory mirror space until this bit is enabled by the user application or the debugger. Set a breakpoint in the space after MMF is enabled.
Suitable Products
RA and FSP
